Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.controller

Interface IController

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface IController
External access to model and controller (server side).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addModelObserver​(ModelObserver observer)
    Forwards a model observer add request to the current game.
    void addPlayer​(String name, PlayerColor color)
    Adds a new player to the current game.
    MessageManager getMessageManager()
    Gets the MessageManager reference, which is created by the controller.
    void handleGamePhase()
    Executes the given game phase.
    void removeModelObserver​(ModelObserver observer)
    Forwards a model observer remove request to the current game.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer​(String name, PlayerColor color)
      Adds a new player to the current game.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player to be added.
      color - Color of the player to be added.

    • handleGamePhase

      void handleGamePhase()
      Executes the given game phase. Sends the first request message to initialize the current game phase.

    • getMessageManager

      MessageManager getMessageManager()
      Gets the MessageManager reference, which is created by the controller.
      Returns:
      The MessageManager reference.

    • addModelObserver

      void addModelObserver​(ModelObserver observer)
      Forwards a model observer add request to the current game.
      Parameters:
      observer - Observer that needs to be added.

    • removeModelObserver

      void removeModelObserver​(ModelObserver observer)
      Forwards a model observer remove request to the current game.
      Parameters:
      observer - Observer that needs to be removed.
